predicate.note: Frames file for 'prepay' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: single arg
example.text: Since most mortgages can be prepaid or refinanced *trace* at any time, issuers of mortgage securities retain the right to buy back their bonds before maturity.

example.name: with price and seller
example.text: Weirton, of Weirton, W. Va., said $60.3 million of the proceeds were used *trace* *trace* to prepay the remaining amounts on the note outstanding to National Intergroup Inc., the parent of National Steel.
example.arg: the remaining amounts on the note outstanding
National Intergroup Inc., the parent of National Steel

example.name: with agent and price
example.text: MEDUSA Corp. said it voluntarily prepaid $7 million on its original $75 million term loan, bringing the total debt reduction for the year to $18 million.
example.arg: bringing the total debt reduction for the year to $18 million
